reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's not suitable for women with large breasts.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great
items.body: Nice but didnt fit Read more
items.author: Mike

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress, but Not Ideal for Large Chests
items.body: I absolutely love the look of the KUTUMAI Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Dress, it's stunning and definitely eye-catching. The ruched detailing and off-shoulder design give it an elegant, yet sexy vibe, and the rest of the dress fits beautifully. Itâ€™s stretchy and body-hugging, which makes it flattering and comfortable. The color options are gorgeous too, and itâ€™s perfect for a formal wedding or a fancy night out. However, as someone who is large-chested, I had trouble with the chest area. The see-through mesh section doesnâ€™t provide enough coverage for me, even when I adjust the upper folded ruched flap part. No matter how I tried to position it, my chest was still half exposed through the mesh, which was disappointing. The rest of the dress fits perfectly, so it seems like the appropriate size overall, but the chest area just doesnâ€™t offer enough coverage for my body shape. Itâ€™s a beautiful dress and would likely work for someone with a smaller chest, but unfortunately, it wasnâ€™t the best fit for me. If you're quite large-chested like me, Iâ€™d recommend considering the fit of the chest area before purchasing. Otherwise, it is so gorgeous, I wish it fit me! Read more
items.author: Terra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars âœ¨ Effortlessly Sexy & Sophisticated â€” The Perfect Grown Woman Dress! âœ¨
items.body: Okay, let me just say â€” this dress ate and left no crumbs! ðŸ˜ Iâ€™m 40, and finding something thatâ€™s sexy and classy can be tricky, but this KUTUMAI dress nailed it. The off-shoulder fit gives just the right amount of flirty, while the ruched bodycon style hugs in all the right places without feeling too tight. The mesh cutout detail adds a little spice, but itâ€™s still totally appropriate for a wedding, dinner date, or any event where you want to turn heads gracefully. The material has great stretch, so I could dance, sit, and move comfortably all night. I paired it with simple heels and statement earrings â€” and felt like that woman! ðŸ’ƒðŸ½ If youâ€™re a grown woman who wants to feel confident, elegant, and just the right amount of sexy, this dress is it. Trust me, youâ€™ll get compliments all night long! ðŸ’• Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for women with large breasts.
items.body: This is a really cute dress, definitely not for a wedding tho. It was a little too sexy and if you have large breasts that piece that goes across arms and chest will not stay in place. The size was exactly as expected, but the fabric was a bit cheap, still really cute but not for me. Read more
items.author: Kendra Hutto

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: This is so cute and fits perfectly. The material is so soft and is pretty stretchy. The design is so pretty and I love the opening on the side/back. Quality is amazing and so pretty I would recommend! Read more
items.author: Tiffany Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooo sexy!! I love this dress!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous on! I absolutely love it! The top of the dress fit me perfectly. I am a size 4 with 36D bust size and I ordered a medium. The bottom of the dress was a little big, making it hang a little different than intended. I still love it! The dress is made of a very stretchy material and can easily accommodate larger sizes. The back of the top is completely see through and very sexy. It can be worn up over the shoulders or off the shoulders. The dress is to the ankle and the skirt part is attached to the top and very light and airy. It could be worn to a very dressy event or a really sexy date night. The dress is so flattering and definitely worth the price! Read more
items.author: Brande B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars KUTUMAI Women Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Dress Cutout Mesh Ruched Bodycon Formal Dress
items.body: The dress is gorgeous and the design is really flattering, but I had to give it 4 stars because it didnâ€™t fit quite right. It was too tight around the bust area, which made it a little uncomfortable. The material and style are lovely, though, and itâ€™s definitely a head-turnerâ€”just be aware that sizing might run small in the chest. It was not see-through and didn't really flow well because of the tightness around the chest area. Read more
items.author: Lady O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS! So flattering!
items.body: This off-shoulder long sleeve maxi dress is so pretty! The cutout mesh detail adds just the right touch edginess and the ruched bodycon fit hugs in all the right places without feeling too tight. The fabric has a nice stretch, making it comfortable for a long evening, and the overall design is perfect for weddings, formal events, or any special occasion. I will say, if you are heavier chested make sure you have a good support bra that stays in place. Read more
items.author: Mela

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
